BR_text.BRsummary: Turi Create Visualization in 5.0b1 broken on macOS 10.13
BR_text.BRdescription: The visualization app seems to have been built for a macOS 10.14+ target. It refuses to run on 10.13 in 5.0b1.

comments_0.comment_text:
Still is not working for me. I am trying to visualize ~150 images.
 turicreate: 5.1
 MacOS: 10.13.5

comments_1.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/zoecarver>@zoecarver</denchmark-link>
  What happens for you on 10.13.5? If you see a loading screen indefinitely, you are probably hitting <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/88>#88</denchmark-link>
  instead of this one.

comments_2.comment_text: I think that was the issue. When I changed the shape of my image SFrame it seemed to work. Might be nice to have an error instead of indefinite loading.

comments_3.comment_text:
Thanks <denchmark-link:https://github.com/zoecarver>@zoecarver</denchmark-link>
  - we'll continue to track that issue in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/88>#88</denchmark-link>
 . It's proven to be very difficult to reproduce; once we are able to reproduce it, we should be able to load correctly (rather than erroring, or loading indefinitely).

comments_4.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link>
  Thanks for the info. I will let you know if I find a good way to reproduce it.

comments_5.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link>
  I'm trying to build an example (<denchmark-link:https://becominghuman.ai/machine-learning-your-first-object-detection-58581795c246>https://becominghuman.ai/machine-learning-your-first-object-detection-58581795c246</denchmark-link>
 ) using turicreate on my Macbook Pro 13", but I'm running in to this issue with visualization. Is there a solution or a workaround meanwhile?

comments_6.comment_text:
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/heikohaensel>@heikohaensel</denchmark-link>
  I assume you are referring to the loading screen, as in issue <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/88>#88</denchmark-link>
 ? So far, we have not found any workaround or fix, and I have been unable to consistently reproduce the issue. Keep an eye on that thread for any updates as we learn more.
